extendedInfo.description: Notice:If you install failed, please backup you data and uninstall old version first and re-install again.Support mail: ireader@zhangyue.comSupport Tel: 400-881-3311 (Only for China)

reviews.title: Galaxy note1
reviews.comment: Very nice and easy reader for chm files.. i\'ve searched alot for such a program ro read my medical books.. Thank you..
reviews.author: Omar Khudruj

reviews.title: Best txt file viewer by miles
reviews.comment: Would have given 5* if full eng. vergion is available. Still most of the menu is in eng. and self intuitive so no problem navigating. Thanks
reviews.author: Che-hwon Bae

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: I have been trying so long to get a free chm reader that could open my medical books with ease. Finally I have found it. Thanks to the app developers.
reviews.author: renju binoy

reviews.title: Best so far
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried five or six Chm readers but none displayed the formatting perfectly. This one does the job, displays any images and opens large files with ease.   My thanks to the programmers :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best chm reader
reviews.comment: Now this app is available for my Acer 10-inch screen tablet, and I use it every day since then. Great job!!!!
reviews.author: Boom Fg

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Only app that I could find to open .mobi files. But it\'s all in Chinese. Is there a way of changing it to English or French? To even find my books, I have to go through my directory directly just to have them show on the shelf. Still a cool app though
reviews.author: Petit Colibri

reviews.title: Works for ereader books but..
reviews.comment: .. Can we please have a full English version?   Menus and options still in Chinese which I don\'t understand.   That said it is one of the best readers I\'ve used and also opens ereader (b&n) encrypted books. Good job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Plz help me out..
reviews.comment: This is one of the best reader i have.. Previously i was using moon reader but chm files are best opened in ireader.. Plz try to convert it in english language and make it so that it cn also play pdb files... Thanx for giving such a great collection...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Best chm file reader in android. I can now read my medical books in chm format. Thanks to developers.
reviews.author: Nadimul Islam

reviews.title: Best CHM reader
reviews.comment: This is best reader for Chm files, not even moon reader pro comes near. Yet i request you to kindly add search option on menu. Plz it is very important for me.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Suggestions
reviews.comment: Hi, I am Adi and i\'m a very fan of your iReader app.  I think that your app is the best there is and very helpful for us. I hope you keep develop this very awesome app.  In this occassion i want to suggest some features that is missing from this app that might be needed very much for everyone. - Search function for chm / text files (this indeed needed) - Select text/copy function for chm  / text files (this would be very very helpful) - UI interaction for CHM /txt files (not for epub files) : despite pressing menu button and press \"table of content\" that cost time to do it, i suggest the app to use gesture \"left to right\" from the left of the screen to show up \"table of content\", like updated version of GMAIL app that show folders with that gesture. Other function such as \"lightscale, charset and setting\" use the menu button.  That is some suggestions that may be very helpful in my humble opinion. But of course i don\'t understand any of that technically, but i just think it would be great.  Thank you very much for your time and considerations. And thank you for the app! It\'s awesome.
reviews.author: Adi Nugroho

reviews.title: Must have app
reviews.comment: Best reader app..no doubt about it..only thing missing is english interface... Why don\'t you introduce option of copying the text....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ireader is the best chm reader for android devices
reviews.comment: ireader with its great functionality and smooth operability(can handle even very large chm files around 500mb) is at present the chm reader of choice for android operating systems(ICS and others)
reviews.author: Dr.Ritesh Deb Roy

reviews.title: Fast with very limited functions
reviews.comment: No doubt its fast n can open heavy files in second but very limited functions
reviews.author: Abhay Rana

reviews.title: thanks but try improving it\'s action with large
reviews.comment: thanks but try improving it\'s action with large files and make it english version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: stupid
reviews.comment: i tried to top up!! but it wont let me and it wont accept my number. gosh
reviews.author: TaeRi Lee

reviews.title: Galaxy Note II
reviews.comment: Wow !!!! No lags at all. No problem navigating. Previously used moon reader, cool reader,and many others....all were slow while opening my medical books (chm) and their UI sucks. Ireader best of all !!!!  (Plz giv text to speech support too) How to adjust font size ? Lots of thanks to the dev!!!! :))
reviews.author: Basista Shah
